title: Sit-on Shoe Rack
description: I built this shoe rack for the tiny entry nook in a friend's apartment. The lower half of the shoe rack is for sitting or dropping bags. The right wall is half-open so my friend can better access the shoes when sitting on the stairs.

title: Scrap Wood Shoe Box
description: I built this shoe box (chest) to hold flip-flops on the balcony of my old apartment and prevent them from dust. The slanted lid allows rain to drip down.
